weave in all remaining loose ends don t forget to weave in the one that connects the start of the dress to the head it s easy to skip - sew flower to bobble om of one ear sew a li le bu on in centre if you wish - sew arms to either side of top of dress slightly to the back - pin legs between the front and back of the dress using red yarn sew the back and front of dress together just on top of the ruffle ensure you catch the legs with a few srtches so they are securely a ached - embroider eyes and nose as per photo - embroider a li le heart on the bobble om of one leg congratularons your rag doll rainbow bunny is now finished 3
